arkInput.text: Al-le-`lu-ia. Lau-`da-te `Do-mi-num in `sanc-tis `e-jus; lau-`da-te `e-um in fir-ma-`men-to vir-`tu-tis `e-ius. `Om-nis `spi-ri-tus `lau-det `Do-mi-num! Al-le-`lu-ia. `Glo-ri-a `Pat-ri et `Fi-li-o et Spi-`ri-tui `Sancto, `si-cut `e-rat in prin-`ci-pi-o et nunc et `sem-per et in `sae-cu-la sae-cu-`lo-rum. A-`men.
